name: CRIMSON BLOOD (Evilous)
description:
Bro I forgot about demo day.

Anyways this is the only thing I will be able to upload on time.

It's a engine demo test I made with a game engine I was trying out.

Nothing special but it's a 3d game with one level. I wish I had time to make the file size smaller or do real improvements. Takes around 5 minutes to complete.

I had a bunch of shit to upload for demo day but I don't have the time to upload them right now.

Have fun and leave feedback. I might use this engine in the future to make real content with. The engine does show some promise but I won't make as much with it as engines I already know how to use well.
